name: University of Alberta - eClass Dark
description: A dark grey eClass to help ease the eyes.
additional_info:
I did this rough and quick, so I may have missed some blocks. Also, there are often inline styles applied which force some small nuggets of text to have a white background. Sorry, there is nothing I can do about this.

Also, this should adjust the UofA auth screen to be dark grey as well. Enjoy!
